title: Always Remember Us This Way
lyrics:
[intro]
That Arizona (Am)sky, burning in your (F)eyes
You (C)look at me and, babe, I wanna catch on (G)fire
It’s buried in my (Am)soul, like California (F)gold
You (C)found the light in me that I couldn’t (G)find

[chorus]
So when I'm (F)all choked up
And I can't find the (C)words
Every (Am)time we say goodbye
Baby, it (G)hurts
When the (F)sun (G)goes (Am)down
And the (F)band (G)won't (C)play
I'll (F)always re(G)member us this (C)way

Lovers in the (Am)night, poets trying to (F)write
We (C)don't know how to rhyme but damn we (G)try
But all I really (Am)know, you're where I wanna (F)go
The (C)part of me that's you will never (G)die

[chorus]
So when I'm (F)all choked up
And I can't find the (C)words
Every (Am)time we say goodbye
Baby, it (G)hurts
When the (F)sun (G)goes (Am)down
And the (F)band (G)won't (C)play
I'll (F)always re(G)member us this (Bb)way, oh yeah
(F)I don't wanna be just a memory, baby, yeah

[bridge]
(C) Hoo-oo-oo, hoo-oo-oo, hoo - hoo
(Bb) Hoo-oo-oo, hoo-oo-oo, hoo - hoo
(F) Hoo-oo-oo, hoo-oo-oo, hoo - (G)hoooo

[chorus]
So when I'm (F)all choked up
And I can't find the (C)words
Every (Am)time we say goodbye
Baby, it (G)hurts
When the (F)sun (G)goes (Am)down
And the (F)band (G)won't (C)play
I'll (F)always re(G)member u-u-us, (Am) this way, way yeah

[outro]
When you (F)look (G)at (Am)me
And the (F)whole (G)world (C)fades
I'll (F)always re(G)member (G-stop)u-u-us… 
This way (F) (Bb) (F)
(C-tremolo) [end]
